props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether or not an accordion item is disabled from user interaction. When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

props.name: unmountOnHide
props.description: When true, the element will be unmounted on closed state.

props.name: value
props.description: A string identifier for the accordion item. If omitted, a unique value will be generated automatically.
